definition[0]: the physical activity that two people do together in order to produce babies, or for pleasure
example[0]: All you see on TV is sex and violence these days.
example[1]: They had sex in the back seat of his car.
example[2]: She no longer wanted to have sex with him.
example[3]: the dangers of casual sex (=having sex with someone without intending to have a serious relationship)
definition[1]: whether a person, plant, or animal is male or female
example[4]: Put your name and sex at the top of the form.
definition[2]: all men, considered as a group, or all women, considered as a group
example[5]: He found it difficult to talk to members of the opposite sex (=people that were not his own sex).
example[6]: People of both sexes (=both men and women) buy her records.
definition[3]: to find out whether an animal is male or female
